sentences: Kathleen "Kathy" Foster is an American musician best known as the bassist for the indie rock band The Thermals and drummer for the All Girl Summer Fun Band.
Foster was raised in Sunnyvale, California and moved to Portland, Oregon in 1998.
With Foster on bass guitar, the Thermals became a mainstay of the Portland indie rock scene beginning in 2003.
She is the owner of the T-shirt company Daydream Factory.
